entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Creating a ASP.NET Core Web App project with "dotnet" at the end of its name results in error 500.0 when debugging with IIS Express. #35998
  • Add an option to the Web API project template to allow the included content to use Minimal APIs instead of controllers #35996
  • How to use Html.DisplayFor correctly ? #35991
  • Exception when running tests for an app that uses Minimal APIs #35990
    6.0-rc2
  • Analyzers - Nullable incorrectly flags null even if checked for non-null #35989
  • CSharpExplicitExpression not being parsed inside TagHelpers #35988
  • Strange coloring in Blazor component parameter #35984
    17.0-Preview5
  • Quarantining `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.FunctionalTests.LinkedApplicationTests.LinkedApplicationWorks` #35977
  • Implement HTTP/3 100 Continue #35974
  • .NET 6, Preview 7: Setting title in WASM App #35973
    6.0-rc2
  • Still producing the Readme.md about identity server when creating a Blazor webassembly app with AAD or AAD B2C auth #35971
    6.0-rc2
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.1.21424.13] SCF Failed to launch after retargetting to .NET 6.0 #35985
  • Java SignalR: App is crashed if AccessTokenProvider Single emits an Error #35968
  • blazor-hotreload.js is missing if `UseFrameworkFiles` is set to a subdirectory #35967
  • [Blazor-Server] Ability to change renderer's Culture on each component #35965
  • Handle not found (404) when using DynamicRouteValueTransformer #35964
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #35963
  • Startup regression: connectionclose, https #35961
  • In-app IHostingStartup instances are not discovered/run when --applicationName is passed via args to WebApplication.CreateBuilder, e.g. from test projects #35956
  • UseDeveloperExceptionPage plain-text response should set charset #35954

Closed

  • Auto-complete places message in the wrong place #35392
  • SignlalR HubConnectionBuilder cookie&proxy with HttpMessageHandlerFactory #35958
  • ProjectSnapshotManagerDispatcher has the same thread used for Language Server & VS Client #35852
    17.0-Preview4
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshotManager` Causing Large Amount of `System.Reactive` Components in Memory #35797
    17.0-Preview4
  • Failed Test `ServerBindTest.CanBindTextboxNullableDateOnlyWithFormat` #34984
    6.0.0
  • Razor offering "use expression body members" light bulb for implicit expressions #35002
  • Consider switching Razor semantic tokens cache to cache tokens per-doc #31989
    17.0-Preview4
  • Embedded TypeScript in Razor does not work in .NET 6 apps, .net 5 is fine #34893
    17.0-Preview4
  • Provisional C# completions no longer work #34820
  • Switching build configurations throws numerous exceptions from DefaultProjectWorkspaceStateGenerator #34771
    17.0-Preview4
  • Create CTI issue for hot reload that is nightly #34295
    17.0-Preview4
  • Using a custom serviceprovider does not work with "minimal" web app #35992
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 7, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 7 #aspnetcore-104050-.NET7 #35774
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 6 RC 1, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6 RC 1 #aspnetcore-104199-.NET6RC1 #35775
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-104221-.NET6 #35776
  • AspNetCore Mvc Controller keeps serializing IAsyncEnumerable after connection is closed #35330
    6.0-rc2
  • ClickOnce support for AspNet+WinForm projects (Electron-like) #35935
  • Make StartupAnalysisBuilder-based analyzers work with WebApplicationBuilder #34404
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #35962
  • Perf regression: https, multiple_queries #35907
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #35960
  • Send FLoC opt-out header by default #35921
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshot` Retained in Memory after Closing Solution and ForceGC #35450
    17.0-Preview4
  • LinkedEditingRange doesn't work at edge of tag names #35951
    17.0-Preview4
  • [RSG] Avoid declaration generation code for cshtml files #35744
    6.0-rc2
  • How to include bootstrap or other css library files in .bundle.scp.css #35898
  • Removing a document results in a lingering TagHelper #35945
    17.0-Preview4
  • Net6P7: Blazor WASM can't upload large files (500MB, 1GB, 2GB) #35899
  • VSMac: dispose DefaultDotNetProjectHost from dispatcher thread #35952
  • Prevent `InvokeVoidAsync` Return Value Serialization #35929
    6.0-rc2
  • InvokeVoidAsync shouldn't serialize return value to .NET #16632
    6.0-rc2
  • TextMate and Razor SemanticTokens don't use the same classification #35860

PullRequests

Created

  • RoleManager.RoleExistsAsync role name normalization issue #35997
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Pass request cancellation token when using IAsyncEnumerable in MVC and WriteAsJsonAsync #35993
  • [release/6.0] Startup analyzers work for minimal apps #35987
  • Fix root '<PageTitle>' not working when a default, static '<title>' is provided #35982
    area-blazor
  • [WIP] Bootstrap v4 support #35981
    area-identity
  • Quarantine `LinkedApplicationTests.LinkedApplicationWorks` #35978
    area-runtime
  • Properly reject non-json FromBody parameter binding #35976
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Don't generate Action links to non-Action named endpoints #35955
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/5.0] Align CODEOWNERS with 'main' #35953
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Align CODEOWNERS with 'main' #35950
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Update templates to use scoped CSS #35658
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel string processing #35711
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Pass request cancellation token when using IAsyncEnumerable in MVC and WriteAsJsonAsync #35866
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel IP/socket address handling #35713
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • release/6.0 Upgrade Selenium Driver #35986
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Upgrade Selenium Version #35949
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Backport `Stop Serializing Return Values for `InvokeVoidAsync` (#35807)` #35979
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup analyzers work for minimal apps #35747
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Support generic array parameters in components #35980
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • Support generic array parameters in components #34734
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-razor.compiler, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Server cancellation and abort exceptions consistency #35861
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Skip client certificate tests on non-Windows #35804
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Stop Serializing Return Values for `InvokeVoidAsync` #35807
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Update Components to use LoggerMessage #35585
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Exclude identityserver readme.txt when not used #35972
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • Update .NET SDK to 6.0.100-rc.2.21430.28 #35948
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Update .NET SDK to 6.0.100-rc.2.21430.28 #35944
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add support for WithTags extension method #35672
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix null-ref for MSAL WASM Auth #35872
    area-blazor
  • Add analyzer for detecting misplaced attributes on delegates #35779
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support generic value tuple parameters in components #34737
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Big-endian fixes: binary data in RenderBatch #35714
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [WIP] Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35875
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Added support for Int64 and DateTime #35855
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • WIP: Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
